data.name: ActivationKey
data.comment: Activation Key

data.name: ActivationKeyInstallError.AccessDenied
data.comment: The activation key was not installed because this environment doesn't have elevated privileges. Please run WinClean as an administrator!

data.name: ActivationKeyInstallError.ComputerActivationFailed
data.comment: The activation key was not installed because the activation service determined that the computer cannot be activated. See https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-server/get-started/activation-error-codes#possible-cause-10 for more details.

data.name: ActivationKeyInstallError.NotActivatingWindows
data.comment: WinClean will not activate windows.

data.name: ActivationKeyInstallError.NotGenuineWindows
data.comment: The activation key was not installed because this is not a genuine windows installation. This could have multiple reasons. See https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-server/get-started/activation-error-codes#possible-cause for more details.

data.name: ActivationKeyInstallError.Other
data.comment: An error occurred, while trying to install the activation key. This could have multiple reasons. https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-server/get-started/activation-error-codes#summary-of-error-codes for more details.

data.name: ActivationKeyInstallError.ProductKeyBlocked
data.comment: The activation key was not installed beacuse it is blocked. This activation key could already be in use or was blocked by Microsoft. Please try again and use a different activation key.

data.name: ActivationKeyInstallError.ProductKeyInvalid
data.comment: The activation key was not installed because it is invalid. Please try again or enter a different activation key.

data.name: ActivationKeyInstallError.ProductKeyNotWorking
data.comment: The activation key was not installed because it didn't work. Please try again or enter a different activation key.

data.name: EnterActivationKey
data.comment: Please enter your activation key below:

data.name: EnterActivationKeyError
data.comment: Input is not a valid windows activation key! Please try again...

data.name: EnterToContinue
data.comment: Press Enter to continue...

data.name: EnterToExit
data.comment: Press enter to exit...

data.name: FatalErrorDefault
data.comment: A fatal error occurred!

data.name: HasActivationKeySelection
data.comment: Do you already have a windows activation key?

data.name: HasActivationKeySelectionAnswerN
data.comment: No, I don't have a windows activation key!

data.name: HasActivationKeySelectionAnswerY
data.comment: Yes, I do have a windows activation key!

data.name: HasActivationKeySelectionError
data.comment: Something went wrong... Skipping windows activation...

data.name: LangaugeSelectionError
data.comment: Something went wrong... English is set as language.

data.name: LanguageAlreadySet
data.comment: Language has already been set to English.

data.name: OsNotWindows
data.comment: WinClean can only be used on Windows!

data.name: OsNotWindows10
data.comment: This windows version is not supported! WinClean is only designed for Windows 10.

data.name: Part1TitleBar
data.comment: ===== Part 1 - Windows Activation =====

data.name: SelectionNotInRange
data.comment: Selection is not in range!

data.name: SelectionNotNumber
data.comment: Selection is not a number!

data.name: SelectionSelect
data.comment: Select

data.name: TitleWelcome
data.comment: Welcome

data.name: WelcomeMessage
data.comment: Welcome to WinClean! WinClean is going to clean and set up your new Windows installation.

data.name: WindowsAlreadyActivated
data.comment: Windows is already activated! Skipping windows activation...

data.name: WindowsNotYetActivated
data.comment: Windows doesn't seem to be activated yet! Let's change that...
